story_13_01000/2401_1001_0100_10:
So...you’re sure you don’t want to join our
team, then?
story_13_01000/2401_1001_0200_10:
Yeah, I’m sorry...
I really love the team I’m on already!
story_13_01000/2401_1001_0300_10: You guys do look awfully strong, though.
story_13_01000/2401_1001_0400_10:
I hope we get to battle someday! I’ll be looking
forward to it! Bye for now!
story_13_01000/2401_1001_0700_10:
Hmph... Sooner or later, she’ll learn she made
a mistake turning down my invitation.
story_13_01000/2401_1001_0800_10:
Though I have to admit, the girl has guts.
She opposed me, knowing full well that I’m
the greatest dragon master in the world!
story_13_01000/2401_1001_0900_10: I’m not sure if she agrees with that last part...
story_13_01000/2401_1001_1000_10:
Well, no matter. Where do we go from here?
I know you’ve taken a liking to the girl,
even if you won’t admit it.
story_13_01000/2401_1001_1100_10:
Should we look for a new member?
We don’t have that much time left.
story_13_01000/2401_1001_1200_10:
I don’t think so. We don’t need anyone else.
We should use that time to train.
story_13_01000/2401_1001_1300_10:
After all, I’m the greatest dragon master ever!
And you’re as elite as they come—one of the
Indigo Elite Four, like my cousin Lance!
story_13_01000/2401_1001_1400_10:
Our team is more than strong enough with
just the two of us. If we were any stronger,
we’d simply be unbeatable!
story_13_01000/2401_1001_1500_10:
You just wait and see, Iris! You’ll regret choosing
another team over ours... I know you will!
story_13_01000/2401_1001_1700_10:
Clair still has so much of that boasting, youthful
overconfidence, doesn’t she... I suppose that’s
where she and Lance are different.
story_13_01000/2401_1001_1800_10:
Then again, maybe that’s what makes her
so fun to watch... Good luck, Clair.
I’ll be right there with you.
